name: NCDOT | Qualification Stage - isDirty False | Opportunity Updated
template:
Hello {{name}},

Your bid of {{bidAmount}} has now been received. The window for placing bids ends on {{offerEndDate}}

From this point there is a minmum 10 business day waiting period for additional bids. If there are multiple bids we will contact all parties via email each time the highest active bid amount increases. You will be able to alter your bid amount via said multiple offer notification. To be considered by NCDOT management the highest bidding price must be upset by at least 5%.

If the highest bid is upset in the final hour of the bidding window, the bidding time is extended by one hour with a maximum of 12 upsets.

The highest bid, if accepted, will submit a non-refundable buyer premium of {{auctionBuyerRate}} of bid amount or {{auctionFixedRate}}, whichever is greater to Carolina Land Experts.This payment is in addition to the purchase price. Payment instructions will be sent along with notification of winning bid within 24 hours of auction closing.

After the buyer premium is paid you will receive an electronic offer package consisting of the NC Offer to purchase, Working with Real Estate Agents brochure and the NCDOT addendum for your review and electronic signature

After signed contract packages have initial acceptance, NCDOT Board approval and in some cases Council of State approval, the Attorney General's office will record the deed for the property owner. The entire process can take 90-120 days from the end of the auction.

Please note, buyer premium is non-refundable for any circumstance.

See www.carolinalandexperts.com for more information on the purchase process.

Please note, We represent the NCDOT and not the purchaser in this transaction.

Carolina Land Experts
919-275-5868

name: NCDOT | Board Review Stage - Initial Acceptance  | Opportunity Updated
template:
Hello {{name}},

Thank you for placing a bid on NCDOT {{ncdot}}: for ${{amountOffered}} The NCDOT has signed your contract package and your bid now has initial approval.

Some properties will require additional review by the NC Council of State prior to final approval. That will require an additional 30-60 days. Once we have final approval, the Attorney General's office will take over and get the deed recorded for the property owner. This can take up to 45-60 days depending on when we have final approval.

We will update you as soon as we have new information. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us.

See www.carolinalandexperts.com for more information on the purchase process.

Please note, We represent the NCDOT and not the purchaser in this transaction.

Carolina Land Experts
919-275-5868 {{data.logger['63e9c356a52b7e7bea94104a']['loggedMessage']}}

name: PRIVATE | Qualification Stage - isDirty False | Opportunity Updated
template:
Hello {{name}},

Your bid of {{amountOffered}} has now been received. The window for placing bids ends on {{offerWindowEndDate}}

From this point there is a 10 business day waiting period for additional bids. If there are multiple bids we will contact all involved parties requesting Highest and Best bids. To be considered by the Seller, the highest bidding price must be upset by at least 1%.

If the highest bid is upset in the final hour of the bidding window, the bidding time is extended by one hour with a maximum of 12 upsets.

The highest bid, if accepted, will submit a non-refundable buyer premium of 10% of bid amount or $200, whichever is greater to Carolina Land Experts. Payment instructions will be sent along with notification of high winning bid.

After the buyer premium is paid You will be sent an offer package for signatures that will be sent to the Seller for initial review. Once we have initial acceptance or counter of the highest bid by the Seller, we will send a completed contract package for your records. Please note, buyer premium is non-refundable for any circumstance.

See www.carolinalandexperts.com for more information on the purchase process.

Please note, We represent the Seller and not the purchaser in this transaction.

Carolina Land Experts

Hello {{name}},

Some properties will require additional review by the NC Council of State prior to final approval. That will require an additional 30-60 days. name: EASYDIGZ | Opportunity Updated - Stage Due Dillegence
template:
Hello again {{name}},

It looks like we are about to cross another item off of our list. Your Due Diligence period is about to end which means you have completed all of the due diligence necessary to safely move forward with the purchase of this property. This includes but is not limited to; all inspections, surveys, appraisals, walk throughs, estimates, lending and other items you would like to have done in order to make sure this is the right home for you.

This also means we are getting closer to closing on this home and moving! Our agents will be in touch with you from now through closing to make sure all of the loose ends are taken care of.

As always, let us know if you need anything at all.


EasyDigz Team
919-275-5868
support@EasyDigz.com

name: NCDOT | Qualification Stage - isDirty True | Opportunity Updated
template:
Hello {{name}},

Your bid of {{bidAmount}} has now been received. The window for placing bids ends on {{offerEndDate}}

If there are multiple bids we will contact all parties via email each time the highest active bid amount increases. You will be able to alter your bid amount via said multiple offer notification. To be considered by NCDOT management the highest bidding price must be upset by at least 5%.

If the highest bid is upset in the final hour of the bidding window, the bidding time is extended by one hour with a maximum of 12 upsets.

The highest bid, if accepted, will submit a non-refundable buyer premium of {{auctionBuyerRate}} of bid amount or {{auctionFixedRate}}, whichever is greater to Carolina Land Experts. Payment instructions will be sent along with notification of winning bid within 24 hours of auction closing.

After the buyer premium is paid you will receive an electronic offer package consisting of the NC Offer to purchase, Working with Real Estate Agents brochure and the NCDOT addendum for your review and electronic signature

After signed contract packages have initial acceptance, NCDOT Board approval and in some cases Council of State approval, the Attorney General's office will record the deed for the property owner. This can take up to 45-60 days depending on when we have final approval.

Please note, buyer premium is non-refundable for any circumstance.

See www.carolinalandexperts.com for more information on the purchase process.

Please note, We represent the NCDOT and not the purchaser in this transaction.

Carolina Land Experts
919-275-5868

name: NCDOT | Reception Stage - High bid notification | Opportunity Updated
template:
Hello {{name}},

You have the highest bid on NCDOT Asset# {{ncdotAsset}} for ${{amountOffered}}.

In order for us to present your bid to the NCDOT for initial acceptance you must submit payment for your non-refundable buyer premium in the amount of ${{buyerPremiumFormulae}}. This payment is in addition to the purchase price. You will now receive an invoice via email from Quickbooks with links for payment options. Payment is due within 72 hours of this notice.

After the non-refundable buyer premium is paid a contract package will be sent to you for electronic signature. Once signed, the contract package will be sent to the NCDOT for initial acceptance.

Within 60 days of initial acceptance, the matter will go before the NCDOT Board for review and approval.

Some properties will require additional review by the NC Council of State prior to final approval. That will require an additional 30-60 days. Once we have final approval, you will receive an email with a request for final payment and a copy of the preliminary deed. After NCDOT receives the final payment, the Attorney General's office will take over and get the deed recorded for the property owner. This can take up to 45-60 days depending on when we have final approval.

We will update you as soon as we have new information. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us.

See www.carolinalandexperts.com for more information on the purchase process.

Please note, We represent the NCDOT and not the purchaser in this transaction.

Carolina Land Experts
919-275-5868

template:

This is a notification regarding your bid on NCDOT remnant property # {{ncdotAsset}}. We have now received multiple bids on this property. The highest active bid is ${{highestBid}}. The window for placing bids ends on {{offerEndDate}}. If the highest bid is upset in the final hour of the bidding window, the bidding time is extended by one hour with a maximum of 12 extensions. We will announce the winner within 24 hours of auction close.
{{conditionIfHighest}}

To be considered by NCDOT management the highest bidding price must be upset by at least 5%.
If you wish to alter your bid please respond via {{{counterOfferLink}}} with your Highest and Best bid amount.

Thank you

See www.carolinalandexperts.com for more information on the purchase process.

Please note, We represent the NCDOT and not the purchaser in this transaction.

Carolina Land Experts
919-275-5868

name: PRIVATE | Qualification Stage - isDirty True | Opportunity Updated
template:
Hello {{name}},

Your bid of {{amountOffered}} has now been received. The window for placing bids ends on {{offerWindowEndDate}}

If there are multiple bids we will contact all involved parties requesting Highest and Best bids. To be considered by the Seller the highest bidding price must be upset by at least 1%.

If the highest bid is upset in the final hour of the bidding window, the bidding time is extended by one hour with a maximum of 12 upsets.

The highest bid, if accepted, will submit their non-refundable buyer premium in the amount of $200 or 10% of bid amount, whichever is greater. Payment instructions will be sent along with notification of high winning bid. The highest bid, if accepted, will submit a buyer premium of 10% of bid amount or $200, whichever is greater to Carolina Land Experts. Payment instructions will be sent along with notification of winning bid within 24 hours of auction closing.

After the buyer premium is paid You will be sent an offer package for signatures that will be sent to the Seller.Once we have initial acceptance or counter of the highest bid by the Seller we will send a completed contract package for your records.

Please note, buyer premium is non-refundable for any circumstance.

See www.carolinalandexperts.com for more information on the purchase process.

Please note, We represent the Seller and not the purchaser in this transaction.

Carolina Land Experts

Hello {{name}},

Thank you for your buyer premium payment for NC DOT Asset # {{ncdot}}

We will now submit to you a contract package for electronic signature via Dotloop. Once you are under contract the matter then goes before the NC DOT Board for review. This will occur within the next 60 days. Some properties will require additional review by the NC Council of state prior to final approval. That will require an additional 30-60 days. Once we have final approval, the Attorney General's office will take over and get the deed recorded for the property owner. This can take up to 45-60 days depending on when we have final approval.

We will update you as soon as we have new information. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us.

name: EASYDIGZ | Listing | Quickbooks - Initial Invoice Paid
template:
Hello {{name}},

Congratulations on taking your first step to selling your home selling with Easy Digz. Welcome to a seamless and rewarding experience!

Selling your home is a significant step, and we're here to ensure it's as smooth and successful as possible. Our platform is designed to streamline the process, making it easy for you to manage everything from listing to closing. Remember, our team is always here to support you at every stage.

Here are a few things to keep in mind as we move forward:

1. Preparation is Key: Make sure your home is in its best shape. Simple improvements like decluttering and a fresh coat of paint can make a big difference.

2. Stay Informed: Keep an eye on your Easy Digz dashboard for updates and insights on your listing's performance.

3. Be Responsive: Potential buyers might have questions. Prompt responses can keep the momentum going and show your commitment to the sale.

4. Utilize Our Resources Our blog is a treasure trove of tips and tricks for sellers. Take advantage of these insights to enhance your selling experience.

Remember, you're not alone in this journey. Our team of experts is just a call or email away, ready to assist you with any questions or guidance you may need.

We're excited to be a part of your journey to sell your home. Thank you for choosing Easy Digz, where we make selling homes straightforward and stress-free.

Warm regards,


EasyDigz
509 W North st Raleigh NC
919.275.5868
NCREL#C34055

name: NCDOT | Under Contract Stage | Opportunity Updated
template:
Hello {{name}},

Thank you for placing a bid on NCDOT {{ncdot}} for ${{amountOffered}}.

The NCDOT has signed your contract package and your bid now has initial approval.

Within 60 days of initial approval the matter will go before the NCDOT Board for review and final approval.

Some properties will require additional review by the NC Council of State prior to final approval. That will require an additional 30-60 days. After NCDOT receives the final payment, you will receive an email with a request for final payment and a copy of the preliminary deed. Once we have final approval, the Attorney General's office will take over and get the deed recorded for the property owner. This can take up to 45-60 days depending on when we have final approval.

We will update you as soon as we have new information. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us.

See www.carolinalandexperts.com for more information on the purchase process.

Please note, We represent the NCDOT and not the purchaser in this transaction.

Carolina Land Experts
919-275-5868

name: NCDOT | Agent Qualification Email | Opportunity Updated
template:
We're writing to confirm that a bid has been successfully submitted on behalf of {{clientName}} for the following property:
Property Details:
  • Address: {{propertyAddress}}
  • Listing ID: {{listingId}}
  • Current Bid Amount: {{bidAmount}}
Next Steps:
  1. Review the bid details with your client to ensure accuracy.
  2. Monitor your email for updates on the auction status.
  3. Advise your client to be prepared for potential counterbids.
Important Information:
  • Auction Closing Date: {{offerEndDateAndTime}}
  • Minimum Bid Increment: {{minimumBidIncrement}}
  • Current Bid Status: {{highestActiveBid}}
Please note that the auction will remain open until the closing date mentioned above. During this time, other potential buyers may submit higher bids. We encourage you to stay engaged with the auction process and consider increasing your bid if necessary. The counteroffer links will be sent to {{buyerEmail}} please monitor for updates. You will be copied on all emails if they are the high bidder. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our support team at support@carolinalandexperts.com or (919)2755868


Thank you for using Carolina Land Experts for your real estate needs. We wish you and your client the best of luck in this auction! Best regards,
